languages.text: "Да! Смерть! Но без вас десятина осталась бы здесь! Это дало бы мне время... Выполнение плана, последний заполненный формуляр — только это имеет значение!"
"Yes! Death! But, with you gone, the tithe would've stayed here! It would've given me time... Meeting the target, filling in the last form: those are the only things that matter!"
languages.original_text: "Да! Смерть! Но без вас десятина осталась бы здесь! Это дало бы мне время... Выполнение плана, последний заполненный формуляр — только это имеет значение!"

traits.locale_text: "Yes! Death! But with you gone, the tithe would've stayed here! It would've given me time... Meeting the planned goals, filling in the last form. Those are the only things that matter!"
"Yes! Death! But with you gone, the tithe would've stayed here! It would've given me time... Meeting the planned goals, filling in the last form. Those are the only things that matter!"
"Yes! Death! But, with you gone, the tithe would've stayed here! It would've given me time... Meeting the planned goals, filling in the last form: those are the only things that matter!"
"Yes! Death! But, with you gone, the tithe would've stayed here! It would've given me time... Meeting the planned goals, filling in the last form: those are the only things that matter!"
"Yes! Death! But, with you gone, the tithe would've stayed here! It would've given me time... Meeting the target, filling in the last form: those are the only things that matter!"
"Yes! Death! But, with you gone, the tithe would've stayed here! It would've given me time... Meeting the target, filling in the last form: those are the only things that matter!"

languages.text: «¡Sí! ¡Muerte! Pero, de no ser por usted, ¡el diezmo se habría quedado aquí! Me habría dado tiempo... Cumplir la cuota, rellenar el último formulario: ¡eso es lo único que importa!».
languages.original_text: "Yes! Death! But, with you gone, the tithe would've stayed here! It would've given me time... Meeting the target, filling in the last form: those are the only things that matter!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Sí! ¡Muerte! Pero, de no ser por usted, ¡el diezmo se habría quedado aquí! Me habría dado tiempo... Cumplir la cuota, rellenar el último formulario: ¡eso es lo único que importa!».

languages.text: “我知道！是死刑！但只要你不在了，这些什一税就会永远留在这里！这样我就有时间……完成我的工作，填好最后的表单！这才是唯一重要的事情！”
languages.original_text: "Yes! Death! But, with you gone, the tithe would've stayed here! It would've given me time... Meeting the target, filling in the last form: those are the only things that matter!"

traits.locale_text: “我知道！是死刑！但只要你不在了，这些什一税就会永远留在这里！这样我就有时间……完成我的工作，填好最后的表单！这才是唯一重要的事情！”

languages.text: 「はい！死です！しかし、あなたが死ねば、租税はここに留まります！そうすれば私には時間がありますし、目標を達成し、最後のフォームをまとめることもできます。これらが唯一重要なことなのです！」
languages.original_text: "Yes! Death! But, with you gone, the tithe would've stayed here! It would've given me time... Meeting the target, filling in the last form: those are the only things that matter!"

traits.locale_text: 「はい！死です！しかし、あなたが死ねば、租税はここに留まります！そうすれば私には時間がありますし、目標を達成し、最後のフォームをまとめることもできます。これらが唯一重要なことなのです！」

languages.text: « Évidemment ! C'est un crime passible de la peine de mort ! Mais une fois débarrassé de vous, la dîme serait restée ici ! J'aurais eu un peu plus de temps devant moi... Atteindre mon objectif et remplir jusqu'au dernier formulaire, voilà tout ce qui compte ! »
languages.original_text: "Yes! Death! But, with you gone, the tithe would've stayed here! It would've given me time... Meeting the target, filling in the last form: those are the only things that matter!"

traits.locale_text: « Évidemment ! C'est un crime passible de la peine de mort ! Mais une fois débarrassé de vous, la dîme serait restée ici ! J'aurais eu un peu plus de temps devant moi... Atteindre mon objectif et remplir jusqu'au dernier formulaire, voilà tout ce qui compte ! »

languages.text: "Evet! Ölüm! Ancak siz ölürseniz aşar burada kalır! Ben de zaman kazanırım... Hedefi tutturur, son formu doldururum. Önemli olan tek şey bu!"
languages.original_text: "Yes! Death! But, with you gone, the tithe would've stayed here! It would've given me time... Meeting the target, filling in the last form: those are the only things that matter!"

traits.locale_text: "Evet! Ölüm! Ancak siz ölürseniz aşar burada kalır! Ben de zaman kazanırım... Hedefi tutturur, son formu doldururum. Önemli olan tek şey bu!"

languages.text: "Ja! Den Tod! Aber ohne Euch wäre der Zehnt hier geblieben. Das hätte mir Zeit verschafft ... Um das Ziel zu erreichen und das letzte Formular auszufüllen: Allein das zählt!"
languages.original_text: "Yes! Death! But, with you gone, the tithe would've stayed here! It would've given me time... Meeting the target, filling in the last form: those are the only things that matter!"

traits.locale_text: "Ja! Den Tod! Aber ohne Euch wäre der Zehnt hier geblieben. Das hätte mir Zeit verschafft ... Um das Ziel zu erreichen und das letzte Formular auszufüllen: Allein das zählt!"
